original_text: Not only was the Teacher wise, but he also imparted knowledge to the people. He pondered and searched out and set in order many proverbs.
korean_text: 전도자는 지혜자이어서 여전히 백성에게 지식을 가르쳤고 또 깊이 생각하고 연구하여 잠언을 많이 지었으며

sentences.original_text: Not only was the Teacher wise
but he also imparted knowledge to the people
and set in order many proverbs
